title: Did The Inca Empire have Advanced technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: The answer would depend entirely upon what you think “advanced” means. If it means electricity and electronics and esoteric technologies that do things our present technology can’t, then, no, they didn’t. If you mean sophisticated methods of record keeping, transportation (roads), building with stone in an earthquake prone region, yes.
Compared to many of their neighbors, yes. Certainly their agricultural methods and stonework were first-rate, but did they have what we would call advanced technology? No.
